projectMetadata.description: A system to detect parking spaces and vehicles in Dutch satellite imagery using YOLO-OBB and merge them into a unified geospatial view.

directoryStructure.yolo26s-obb-heavy-aug6/: YOLO model weights and training artifacts

chunks.summary: React components for the application UI, including maps, dashboards, and job management.
keyFunctions: JobHeader: Simplified header with single 'Total Images' input
JobView: Main container with intelligent image-to-grid mapping

changeHistory.description: Simplified Advanced Settings by replacing complex NxM grid controls with a single 'Total Images to Process' input and slider.

globalChangeLog.description: Simplified analysis extent controls to use a single 'Total Images' metric
